Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2003...
Injured on 6/11/2003 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/31/2003 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/4/2005 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/2005 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/2006 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Injured on 4/4/2007 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/5/2007 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 8/30/2007 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/2/2008, off Bartolo Colon (FLA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/4/2009, off Jason Bulger (FLA)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 7/4/2011 (Going to PIT: P S. Wiggins, P C. Lee, LF C. Ambres, P P. Ryan, 3B C. Gillaspie. Going to SEA: 2B D. Pedroia, CF M. Bourn, P M. Prior)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 8/10/2013...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/1/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $999,999 per year...
Released by St. Louis on 8/23/2018...
Drafted in 8th round, 218th overall pick, by Florida in 2019...
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1977...
Injured on 8/20/1977 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/3/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
